mapper.select: select no, title, content, map_content, writer, cover_image, is_share, end_date, start_date, tag, view_cnt, like_cnt, register_date from D_diary where no = #{no}
mapper.insert: insert into d_diary(no, title, content, map_content, writer, end_date, start_date, cover_image, is_share, tag) values(d_diary_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{map_content}, #{writer}, #{end_date}, #{start_date}, #{cover_image, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{is_share}, #{tag} ) SELECT d_diary_seq.currval FROM dual
